meanings.definition: The quality or state of being undeniable.
meanings.sent1: The undeniableness of the evidence left no room for doubt.
meanings.sent2: Her undeniableness in the matter made everyone trust her judgment.
meanings.sent3: The undeniableness of his love for ice cream was evident in his daily trips to the ice cream parlor.
meanings.sent4: The undeniableness of the sunrise painted the sky in hues of pink and orange.
meanings.sent5: The undeniableness of the mountain's beauty took my breath away.

meanings.definition: The fact of being impossible to deny or dispute.
meanings.sent1: The undeniableness of the facts presented in the report convinced everyone of the truth.
meanings.sent2: She couldn't ignore the undeniableness of her mistake and apologized immediately.
meanings.sent3: The undeniableness of his claim to have seen a unicorn made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The undeniableness of the storm's arrival sent everyone scrambling for cover.
meanings.sent5: The undeniableness of the puppy's cuteness melted everyone's hearts.
